name: Square Garden (itch)
description:
Inputs -

Left mouse click / Touch to click on buttons or select buttons.

Hold left mouse click / Hold touch and drag across the screen to select an area to place plants on the garden.

Flow -

When the level starts, listen to what grandpa has to say and click on ' Next ' to continue.
Eventually grandpa will ask you a question or give you a task to complete, click on ' Check ' to answer or check the result of the given task.
